displayProperties.description:
Complete the Spark Redux mission, get Super kills in the Crucible, and defeat Guardians in the Crucible.

Generate Elemental Orbs by wearing the full Solstice Armor set during the Solstice of Heroes event.
displayProperties.name: Solstice Hood (Scorched)

sourceString: Source: Earned during the 2018 Solstice of Heroes event.
